sentences.sContent: We went out in spite of the rain.
sentences.sCn: 尽管下着雨，我们还是出去了。

sentences.sContent: Kelly loved her husband in spite of the fact that he drank too much.
sentences.sCn: 虽然丈夫酗酒，凯莉仍然爱着他。

sentences.sContent: ...In spite of the potential of machines to replace workers...
...in spite of much popular belief to the contrary...
...Some travel agents are thriving in spite of the economy...
...The turtle population has decreased in spite of human protection...
...College education is rewarding in spite of the startling costs...
...In spite of the possible benefits mentioned...
